bug_description: After capturing and exporting/saving a photo, the "Your Images" list remains empty and shows "No Images Found", indicating the newly added photo is not persisted or not displayed.
action: From the home screen, tap "Capture Image" to take a photo, then tap "Export" (save). After that, open "Your Images" / "See Images" to view the saved photos.
expected_state: The exported/saved photo should appear in the "Your Images" list (and be viewable), instead of showing an empty state.
